title: FORESTRY TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from:

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work, Woodwork for Civil Engineering Technology,

Further Mathematics

English Language, Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

For Marine Engineering and Industrial Safety & Environmental Engineering. 'O' Level pass in Biology is required.

'O' Level credit pass in English Language is required.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Chemistry, Physics or Technical Drawing.
